title: Russia Shrinks Forces in Syria, a Factor in Israeli Strategy There
description: Moscow withdrew a key air defense system and some troops to bolster its war in Ukraine, officials said, potentially altering Israel’s calculations about striking Syria or arming Ukraine.
dc:creator: Patrick Kingsley and Ronen Bergman
media:description: Russian military police in the northeastern Syrian city of Qamishli in 2020. Moscow is sending more military police to Syria to help replace troops withdrawn from the country.
